name: Ananth Grama
content: Ananth Grama Ananth Grama Samuel D. Conte Distinguished Professor of Computer Science Associate Director, Center for Science of Information Purdue University Ananth Grama's research focuses on parallel and distributed computing with applications in modeling, design, advanced manufacturing, machine learning, and artificial intelligence for complex physical systems. His work on computer systems focuses on load balancing, resource management, data management, and security. His recent work on algorithms and analysis focuses on establishing fundamental bounds on hallucinations, online learning, learning in faulty and private environments, and quantum machine learning. He applies these systems concepts and algorithms to a range of applications, including materials modeling, systems biology, transcriptomics, clinical analytics, and structural design.
